scripts.build:e2e-client: docker build -f client/Dockerfile.configured client -t montepouli_client:e2e --build-arg CLIENT_BASE_IMAGE_NAME=montepouli_client --build-arg CLIENT_BASE_IMAGE_TAG=latest --build-arg CLIENT_TYPE=e2e
scripts.build-app: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build-e2e-app: npm run build:client && npm run build:e2e-client && npm run build:server
scripts.start:e2e-environment-base: (npm run build:e2e-environment & npm run pull:e2e-environment) && npm run restart:e2e-db && docker-compose -f docker-compose-e2e.yml up
scripts.start:e2e-environment: npm run build-e2e-app && npm run start:e2e-environment-base -- -d
scripts.start:e2e-tests: docker-compose -f docker-compose-e2e.yml build e2e-tests && docker-compose -f docker-compose-e2e.yml up -d e2e-tests
scripts.docker-compose-rebuild: docker-compose build --parallel && docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d
scripts.docker-compose-rebuild-no-cache: docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d

hooks.pre-push: lerna run --parallel test & lerna run --parallel build:pre-push
